div.p: Silverton School will provide meals for ALL students, free of charge, beginning Wednesday, March 25th through April 3rd with extensions based on any further delays based on the COVID-19 situation. Meals will be available through a pick-up line in front of the cafeteria. Food will be provided from 9:00am - 11:00pm Monday-Friday. Breakfast and lunch for each student will be brought to each vehicle. Please remain in your vehicle and someone will be there to assist you and your family. The ONLY stipulation is that the student requiring the meal must be in the vehicle. For example, if you come by needing four students’ meals, you must have four students in the vehicle with you.
Updated information from the Center for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) on coronavirus in the USA can be found at: https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/index.html.
The most recent information about coronavirus in Texas may be found at the Texas Health and Human Services Website: https://dshs.texas.gov/coronavirus/.
